response: To subscribe or manage your membership, go to the Membership section on the home page. We offer Monthly, Quarterly, and Annual plans.
You can cancel or renew your subscription anytime from your Profile > Membership settings. Billing cycles depend on the plan selected.
Our certified trainers are available across different time slots. You can check the schedule in the Trainers section.
We offer personalized diet plans based on your goals. Go to Diet Plans under your dashboard to access yours.
For a customized workout plan, visit the Workout tab. We offer beginner to advanced routines including full-body, push-pull-legs, and more.
Our Yoga section includes poses like Tadasana, Cobra, and Downward Dog with descriptions and benefits. Great for stress, strength, and flexibility.
Breathing exercises like Anulom-Vilom and Bhramari help in stress relief and improving focus. Find them under the Yoga > Breathing section.
You can browse fitness apparel, whey, yoga mats, and more in our Shop section. Offers and delivery timelines are mentioned there.
Our AI-powered posture correction tool helps guide your form during workouts and yoga. Accessible from the dashboard.
For refund or return issues, go to Support > Orders. Our policy allows returns within 7 days for eligible items.
